bibl.title: P. Coll. Youtie 77 = P. Col. VII 171 Revisited.
bibl.note: "There is nothing that would entitle us to treat the presence of the monk Isaac close to Karanis as a clue to determine his belonging to any monastic group active in Egypt."

bibl.title: Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas

bibl.seg: WIPSZYCKA Ewa, P. Coll. Youtie 77 = P. Col. VII 171 Revisited.
Traianos GAGOS and Roger S. BAGNALL (Edd.), Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas = American Studies in Papyrology. 42 (Oakville, Connecticut, 2001) pp. 45-50.
"There is nothing that would entitle us to treat the presence of the monk Isaac close to Karanis as a clue to determine his belonging to any monastic group active in Egypt."
